title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: Bug 10022: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if there is no need for a manual build.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when there is no need for a manual build.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there is a need for a manual build.
SR: The enablement of the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should depend on whether there is a need for a manual build.
